channel.title: surface on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in surface on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: Coinbase’s bouncing QR code Super Bowl ad was so popular it crashed the app (2 minute read) Coinbase’s Super Bowl ad was so popular its app temporarily crashed.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-25
item.description: Google now lets you password-protect the page that shows all your searches (2 minute read) Google users now have the option to add a password to their Web and Activity page.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-13
item.description: The Surface Duo, Microsoft’s first-ever Android phone, is $1,400 (6 minute read) The Surface Duo is now available for pre-order and will ship on September 10.
